item.title: Mtyas contributions
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

mtyas/reverb/shortverb.axs

status

active

description:

a 100 wet short strange reverb, with no apparent controls.
Open subpatch to adjust filter/allpass and filter/fdbkcomb ratios for different flavors.

Read full topic

item.title: Mtyas contributions
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

mtyas/dist/stereoTriDistortion.axs

status

active

description:

add distortion and grit to any stereo input, with 3 different flavors in parallel, each with adjustable input and output gain

Read full topic

item.title: Mtyas contributions
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

mtyas/delay/long-delay.axs

status

active

description:

a 10 second mono delay line with feedback, speed and amount inputs. Changing the speed will result in a cheap "tape" speed wobble

Read full topic

item.title: Mtyas contributions
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

mtyas/control/tempoclock.axs

status

active

description:

switch between internal clock (variable speed) (lfo/square) and midi clock sync (input) with 8 synced tempo variations

Read full topic

item.title: Mtyas contributions
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

mtyas/control/oneknob 2func.axs

status

active

description:

one input to two outputs with memory and soft takeover mode.
useful for adjusting two different parameters with only one knob and a switch.
The value will only change if you catch up to the value it was before you changed output

Read full topic
